IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Caring Residential Services III, Inc. is a Christian based organization serving the frail, impaired aged and disabled, young adults.
IRS990.MissionDesc: Our mission is to communicate the love and work of Jesus Christ Our Lord for all peoples through serving the frail, impaired aged and disabled young adults. These ministries reach out to accomplish the following for as many in need as possible: Prevent institutional placement by providing community-based alternatives. Provide respite and support for families and other care givers. Present a "today-worth-the-living" to the frail and impaired elderly, and disabled young adults.
IRS990.Desc: Caring Residential Services III, Inc. provides two, four unit rental houses for low-income seniors with special needs in Egg Harbor Township, New Jersey.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization holds tenant security deposits.

The Organization follows the Financial Accounting Standards Board (FASB) guidance that requires a tax position to be recognized based on a "more likely than not" threshhold. The Organization does not believe its financial statements include any uncertain tax positions. No interest or penalties pertaining to uncertain tax positions were required to be recognized in the year ended March 31, 2018.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: Some Board members of Caring Residential Services III, Inc. also serve on the Board of Caring, Inc. which provides administrative services as noted in Schedule R.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Certain operations management for the Organization is performed by Caring, Inc.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: After management has reviewed Form 990, it is distributed to the Board of Directors, and then filed.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Management compiles data regarding any conflicts of interest reflected on the disclosures and informs the Board of Directors of the conflict. Business practice is to avoid purchases from individuals or businesses with conflicts.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The compensation committee of Caring, Inc., a controlling tax-exempt entity, performs a review of the Director's compensation and of the compensation of any other employee making in excess of $100,000 per year prior to any change for these individuals, taking into consideration the duties of the individual, his or her performance and comparable compensation of executives in the same or similar industry in the general region. All compensation decisions are made through the controlling entity, CARING, Inc. as this entity does not directly employ any individuals.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Caring Residential Services III, Inc. generally does not make its governing documents, conflict of interest policy, and financial statements available to the public. If a request were to be made, it would be considered based upon the nature of the request and a decision would be made on a case-by-case basis. Form 990 is available upon request and can be obtained via website at www.guidestar.org.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VII, Section A, Column B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Hours shown by officers with reportable compensation from related organizations include those hours dedicated to this organization as well as the related organization.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part XI, Line 2c, Audit Oversight:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The process has not changed from the prior year.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: Care and fellowship for seniors and individuals with disabilities
Housing for seniors and individuals with disabilities
